name: Future Is The New Past
description:
The future is horrific and bad spirites are about to destroy the world. Travel in time to change the worlds destiny!

This game is still in progress! So, if you come accross any bugs or suggestions, please feel free to let me know about them! :)

As you can see, most of the assets were made by other people. The reason for that is, I wanted to specialise on the Level Design / Programming, since I did not rhave a lot of time left on Saturday (Second Game Jam Day). However, I hope you will enjoy this prototype anyway :)

Used Assets:

  • Character:
    • https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero
  • Sound:
    • https://tomkitchen.itch.io/emporium-soundtrack
    • https://minu1994.itch.io/music-for-your-projects-creepy-piano
    • https://cactusdude.itch.io/free-game-soundtrack-by-cactusdude-hurry-up
  • General Design:
    • https://nectanebo.itch.io/menu-buttons
    • https://tinyworlds.itch.io/free-pixel-font-thaleah
  • Level Design:
    • https://trixelized.itch.io/starstring-fields
    • https://free-game-assets.itch.io/free-post-apocalyptic-pixel-art-backgrounds
    • https://v-ktor.itch.io/nebula-background-images

P.S. For those of you who are interested and do not want to download the game - it was made with Unity ^^
